data.title: The Software Toolworks
data.text:
The Software Toolworks is IT

The Force was with Anne O'Brien when she was hired as technical writer and technical editor by The Software Toolworks (later Mindscape). She had these major project management responsibilities.

Documentation project manager, senior technical writer and senior technical editor responsible for 143+ game and educational software products.

Collaborated with 17 international entertainment developers and their IT teams of programmers, graphic artists, quality assurance testers and technical support.

Set the benchmark for computer game online and printed documentation.

Trained technical writers in Novato California, Bordeaux France and London England in the development of excellent software online help, user guides and quick start cards. publications and online help

Designed a simple procedure to transfer PC help into Macintosh help.

Also designed a simple procedure to translate English online help into French, Spanish, Italian and German.

Anne O'Brien is the only technical writer in history to sweep regional awards and score an International 3rd place from the Society for Technical Communication (STC) for the childrens' Nintendo game, Mario Is Missing! A Multimedia Geography Adventure Macintosh CD-ROM.

Entertainment is IT

Anne O'Brien efficiently collaborated with IT Teams worldwide as senior technical writer and senior technical editor for hundreds of software products. She also provided technical editing services and translation protocols to her IT Teams. Anne O'Brien worked with and for combos of these developers.

Apple Inc. Cupertino CA USA

Atreid Concept SA Bordeaux France

Hasbro Inc. Providence Rhode Island USA

Kalisto Entertainment SA Bordeaux France

Lucasfilm LTD. San Rafael CA USA

Mattel Inc. El Segundo CA USA

Microprose Hunt Valley MD USA

Microsoft Seattle WA USA

Mindscape Bordeaux France

Mindscape Inc. Novato CA USA

NAMCO USA inc.

Nintendo Kyoto Prefecture Japan

Origin Systems Austin TX USA

SEGA San Francisco CA USA

Sierra Online Seattle WA USA

The Software Toolworks Novato CA USA

Worldscape London England

And Translators in Bordeaux France, Madrid Spain, Milan Italy, London England, and Dusseldorf Germany.

Cross Platform IT Girl

Anne O'Brien's had to play games to write about them. Her office looked like a teenager's dream with every platform and operating system. This was necessary as she documented game and educational software that crossed multiple platforms and operating systems. She also documented many games that stood alone on one platform. The Terminator is an example of a game that was only released on 1 platform, Super Nintendo.

Platforms

Nintendo

Nintendo Game Boy

Super Nintendo

SEGA Game Gear

SEGA Genesis

SEGA CD

Operating Systems

DOS

Macintosh

Macintosh CD ROM

Power Mac G5

Windows 3X

Windows 98

Windows XP

The Chessmaster is IT

Anne O'Brien's opinion of The Chessmaster is that it is the most awesome game and educational software engineering wizardry ever. The software comes with supporting printed material, online help, quick hints, a selection of chessboards, chess pieces and a database of classic games of chess. The Chessmaster was a flagship game and educational software product for The Software Toolworks and Mindscape. Anne O'Brien had the pleasure of serving senior technical writer and senior technical editor for these versions of The Chessmaster.

The Chessmaster 3000 (PC)

The Chessmaster 3000 Multimedia

The Chessmaster 3000 Macintosh CD-ROM

The Chessmaster 4000

The Chessmaster 5000

The Chessmaster 5500

The Chessmaster Online

Anne O'Brien has 4 million satisfied users worldwide thanks to The Chessmaster alone. And, yes, it is for sale online.

The Software Toolworks Star Wars Chess is IT

Anne O'Brien wrote a user guide for every release of The Software Toolworks Star Wars Chess on all platforms and operating systems. The user interface is simple. Atop The Chessmaster's powerful software engine there is one chessboard. Players can choose from 2 sets of chess pieces.

White: Luke Skywalker (king), Princess Leia (queen), C-3PO (bishops), Chewbacca (knights), Yoda (rooks) and R2-D2 (pawns). White always go first in chess.

Black: The Emperor (king), Darth Vader (queen), Boba Fett (bishops), Tusken Raiders (knights), AT-ST (rooks) and Stormtroopers (pawns).

When a piece is captured there is a battle animation then the captured piece disappears.

Mavis Beacon Teaches Typing is IT

Mavis Beacon Teaches Typing! is a grand fine way to learn touch typing. Anne O'Brien developed online and print documentation for version 2 and operated as Senior Technical editors on other versions. above. When additional staff were promoted or hired as technical writers, she acted as technical editor, trainer and used this software to train them how to develop online help and printed material for software on the PC and Macintosh.
